name: my retina is red
description:
my retina is red is an absurdist game about drug-induced distortion and blurred vision.

The game is played using the computer keyboard's four arrow keys to control the eye-drop movements.

The eye drops should be placed onto the iris.

This game forms part of the Back To Mortality digital art collection.

Back To Mortality is about humans' relationship with drugs, our minds' responses to drugs, and the inevitable return to sober states.

There is a zine, comic book, game + more in the collection.
